detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract PORTA (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PORTA.sol#89-161) has payable functions:
	 - PORTA.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PORTA.sol#154-156)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Contract locking ether found in :

	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
